actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat certain retailers of natural gas as independent producers for purposes of the crude oil windfall profit tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat specified retailers of natural gas as independent producers for purposes of the windfall profit tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat certain retailers of natural gas as independent producers for purposes of the crude oil windfall profit tax.
